institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Skill Competition Management Rules/Article 10 (City/Province Committee Advisory Body)
contents: Article 10 (City/Provincial Committee Advisory Body) ① City/Provincial Committees may establish a City/Provincial Operation Advisory Committee for business development and cooperation with related organizations in the region in relation to the holding and operation of skill competitions, and A city/provincial technical advisory committee may be established to investigate, research, and advise on technical matters such as new establishment and opening/closing proposals or stadium facilities and equipment. , It is composed and operated by up to 20 people, including city and provincial operating committee members, and advises and discusses the following matters: 1. Matters related to local competition holding plans and budget, 2. Matters related to national competition participation plan and budget, 3 Matters related to holding and operating the national competition and support for budget utilization; 4. Other matters necessary for the business operation of city/provincial committees; ③ Details regarding the operation of the city/provincial operation advisory committee and city/provincial technical advisory committee. ·The provincial chairperson may decide and implement it separately.
